description.en: Collect 4 different types of coins, 4 pieces each. Collect them in a cup and put the cup right in the middle of the challenge field. Your task is to sort out coins into 4 groups and collect the same pieces in the 4 corners of the challenge field.

Start your robot from the start line.
Pile up one type of coins in one corner.
For example: 5 cent coins in the yellow corner, 25 cent coins in the red corner.
Coins must stay within the square.

You completed the task within 12 minutes = Great!
You completed the task within 10 minutes = Excellent job!
You completed the task within 7 minutes = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 12 minutes = 5 points

Finished within 10 minutes = 10 points

Finished within 7 minutes = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
